content: i believe anybody can knit even a sweater as your very first project this chunky raglan is designed to be made to measure with minimal math making it the perfect approachable knit for beginners who want a cozy handmade piece without getting overwhelmed with numbers if you can knit and purl you can make this sweater the construction is simple and seamless start at the neckband then increase to shape the yoke once it fits comfortably across your shoulders you ll separate the sleeves and knit the body to your desired length the sleeves are worked afterward with the option to keep them straight or add a little shaping no seaming required whether you re casting on your very first project or just want a fast chunky sweater this pattern will guide you step by step this pattern is paired with a full step-by-step youtube tutorial that walks you through the process follow along visually while using this pdf as a simple reference guide **details** construction seamless top-down raglan knit in the round gauge 12 sts = 4 in / 10 cm in stockinette needles 8 mm us 11 and 6 5 mm us 10 5 sizes s/m l/xl+ made to measure for a custom fit skill level 1/5 extremely beginner friendly
